text: "Lovin', Touchin', Squeezin'" is a 1979 song by Journey was taken from fifth studio album Evolution. It went to number 16 in the United States, number 37 in New Zealand and number 12 in Canada. It was covered by American heavy metal band Dream Theater. == References == Category:1979 songs Category:Journey (band) songs Category:Dream Theater songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Lovin', Touchin', Squeezin'
